lead_paragraph: Ravens linebacker Roderick Green was stabbed early yesterday during a fight at a bowling alley, Baltimore County police said. A Ravens spokesman said Green's injury did not appear to be serious. The police said a fight broke out when Green, 24, bumped into another bowler. Green tried to break it off and left the alley, but the man came after him and stabbed him in the parking lot.
